Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, but also impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but prone to distractions and scatterbrained.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but moody and overly attached.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but also prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, but perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, but indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and perceptive, but intense and controlling.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambitious and responsible, but serious and restrictive.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but rebellious and unconventional.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, but dreamy and unrealistic.
Note: These scores are based on a general understanding of each sign's traits and characteristics, and are not meant to be taken as absolute or scientifically proven.
